question.title: At the 2024 Olympics, will at least 5 countries win their debut gold medal?
question.body: This question resolves as **Yes** if 5 or more countries win their first-ever Olympic gold medal at the Paris Olympics, according to [credible sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions).

not_P.title: At the 2024 Olympics, will fewer than 5 countries win their debut gold medal?
not_P.body: This question resolves as **Yes** if fewer than 5 countries win their first-ever Olympic gold medal at the Paris Olympics, according to [credible sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions).

para_P.title: Will there be a minimum of 5 nations that secure their first Olympic gold medal at the 2024 Games?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be considered **Yes** if 5 or more nations achieve their inaugural Olympic gold medal at the Paris Olympics, based on [reliable sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions).

question.title: Will Individual Neutral Athletes Win ≥15 Gold Medals at the Paris 2024 Olympics?
question.body:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Individual Neutral Athletes collectively win 15 or more gold medals at the Paris 2024 Olympic Games. The source of resolution will be the official medal tally published by the International Olympic Committee (IOC) or other credible sources if such reporting from the IOC is unavailable. Otherwise the market will resolve to "No".

In the event that Individual Neutral Athletes are confirmed to have won 15 or more gold medals prior to the end of the Games, the market will resolve immediately to "Yes".

not_P.title: Will Individual Neutral Athletes Win <15 Gold Medals at the Paris 2024 Olympics?
not_P.body:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Individual Neutral Athletes collectively win fewer than 15 gold medals at the Paris 2024 Olympic Games. The source of resolution will be the official medal tally published by the International Olympic Committee (IOC) or other credible sources if such reporting from the IOC is unavailable. Otherwise the market will resolve to "No".

In the event that Individual Neutral Athletes are confirmed to have won fewer than 15 gold medals prior to the end of the Games, the market will resolve immediately to "Yes".

para_P.title: Are Individual Neutral Athletes Expected to Secure 15 or More Gold Medals at the Paris 2024 Olympics?
para_P.body:
This market will conclude with a "Yes" if Individual Neutral Athletes together achieve 15 or more gold medals during the Paris 2024 Olympic Games. The resolution will be based on the official medal count released by the International Olympic Committee (IOC) or other reliable sources if IOC reporting is not available. If not, the market will result in a "No".

Should it be confirmed that Individual Neutral Athletes have won 15 or more gold medals before the conclusion of the Games, the market will immediately resolve to "Yes".

question.title: Will both of the following occur at the Paris 2024 Olympics: (a) At least 5 countries win their debut gold medal and (b) Individual Neutral Athletes win ≥15 gold medals?
question.body:
This question resolves as **Yes** if both of the following conditions are met during the Paris 2024 Olympic Games:

1. At least 5 countries win their first-ever Olympic gold medal, according to credible sources.
2. Individual Neutral Athletes collectively win 15 or more gold medals. The source of resolution will be the official medal tally published by the International Olympic Committee (IOC) or other credible sources. If Individual Neutral Athletes are confirmed to have won 15 or more gold medals prior to the end of the Games, this part resolves immediately to "Yes".

not_P.title: Will not both of the following occur at the Paris 2024 Olympics: (a) At least 5 countries win their debut gold medal or (b) Individual Neutral Athletes win <15 gold medals?
not_P.body:
This question resolves as **Yes** if at least one of the following conditions is not met during the Paris 2024 Olympic Games:

1. At least 5 countries do not win their first-ever Olympic gold medal, according to credible sources.
2. Individual Neutral Athletes collectively win less than 15 gold medals. The source of resolution will be the official medal tally published by the International Olympic Committee (IOC) or other credible sources. If Individual Neutral Athletes are confirmed to have won less than 15 gold medals prior to the end of the Games, this part resolves immediately to "Yes".

para_P.title: Will there be at least 5 nations achieving their first Olympic gold medal and Individual Neutral Athletes securing 15 or more gold medals at the Paris 2024 Olympics?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will be answered as **Yes** if both of the following criteria are fulfilled during the Paris 2024 Olympic Games:

1. A minimum of 5 nations earn their inaugural Olympic gold medal, as reported by reliable sources.
2. Individual Neutral Athletes together obtain 15 or more gold medals. The determination will be based on the official medal count released by the International Olympic Committee (IOC) or other trustworthy sources. If it is confirmed that Individual Neutral Athletes have won 15 or more gold medals before the conclusion of the Games, this aspect will immediately resolve to "Yes".

question.title: Will the Prime Minister of France belong to a coalition other than New Popular Front or Together on July 30, 2024?

para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with Yes if the coalition of the French Prime Minister is not New Popular Front or Together on July 30th, at 12:00 Central European Time, based on reliable sources.

question.title: Will the ID political group hold the most seats after the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections?
question.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if the ID political group holds the most seats after the 2024 European Parliament elections. It will resolve as **No** for all other political groups. If two groups are tied for seats, both sub-questions will resolve as **Yes**.

This question resolves on the basis of [official statements by the European Parliament](https://www.europarl.europa.eu/portal/en) or credible media reports.

not_P.title: Will the ID political group not hold the most seats after the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections?
not_P.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if the ID political group does not hold the most seats after the 2024 European Parliament elections. It will resolve as **No** for all other political groups. If two groups are tied for seats, both sub-questions will resolve as **No**.

This question resolves on the basis of [official statements by the European Parliament](https://www.europarl.europa.eu/portal/en) or credible media reports.

para_P.title: After the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections, will the ID political faction secure the highest number of seats?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will be answered with **Yes** if the ID political faction secures the highest number of seats following the 2024 European Parliament elections. It will be answered with **No** for all other political factions. In the event of a tie between two factions for seats, both sub-questions will be answered with **Yes**.

The resolution of this inquiry will be based on [official statements from the European Parliament](https://www.europarl.europa.eu/portal/en) or reliable media coverage.

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) The Prime Minister of France will belong to a coalition other than New Popular Front or Together on July 30, 2024; (b) The ID political group will hold the most seats after the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections?
question.body: This question will resolve as Yes if both of the following conditions are met: (a) The party of the Prime Minister of France is not New Popular Front or Together on July 30th, at 12:00 Central European Time, according to credible sources. (b) The ID political group holds the most seats after the 2024 European Parliament elections, according to official statements by the European Parliament or credible media reports. It will resolve as No if either or both of these conditions are not met. If two political groups are tied for seats, condition (b) will still resolve as Yes.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur: (a) The Prime Minister of France will belong to a coalition other than New Popular Front or Together on July 30, 2024; (b) The ID political group will hold the most seats after the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as Yes if neither of the following conditions are met: (a) The party of the Prime Minister of France is not New Popular Front or Together on July 30th, at 12:00 Central European Time, according to credible sources. (b) The ID political group holds the most seats after the 2024 European Parliament elections, according to official statements by the European Parliament or credible media reports. It will resolve as No if at least one of these conditions is met. If two political groups are tied for seats, condition (b) will still resolve as No.

para_P.title: Will the Prime Minister of France be part of a coalition that is neither New Popular Front nor Together on July 30, 2024, and will the ID political group have the highest number of seats following the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections?
para_P.body: This inquiry will conclude with a Yes if both of the following criteria are satisfied: (a) The Prime Minister of France's party is not New Popular Front or Together on July 30th, at 12:00 Central European Time, based on reliable sources. (b) The ID political group has the most seats after the 2024 European Parliament elections, as per official announcements from the European Parliament or trustworthy media reports. It will be deemed No if either or both of these criteria are not fulfilled. In the event of a tie between two political groups for the number of seats, condition (b) will still be considered Yes.

question.title: Will Ted Cruz be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if Ted Cruz is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. All other candidates will resolve as **No**. This question is not restricted to the candidates currently below; other options may be added in the future.

For this question, it is not relevant who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

Any other candidates will result in a **No** resolution. This question is open to the possibility of additional candidates being included in the future.

For the purposes of this question, it does not matter who is nominated by the Republican party on the day of the 2024 US election; the determination is solely based on who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

The question resolves as **No** if either or both of these conditions are not met.

This is determined by who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention), not who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election. (b) The Electoral College probability for Harris in Nate Silver's model is <=46.6% on Friday August 9th at 8:40 PM, according to [Nate Silver's model](https://www.natesilver.net/p/nate-silver-2024-president-election-polls-model). para_P.body: This inquiry will conclude as **Yes** if both of the following criteria are fulfilled: (a) Ted Cruz is chosen by the Republican National Convention as the candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election. This is determined by the selection made by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention), rather than who is announced as the Republican nominee on election day in 2024. The outcome will be **No** if either or both of these criteria are not satisfied.

question.title: [Metaculus] Will Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024 that he will not accept the Democra...nomination for President?
question.body:
Will Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024 that he will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President?

Resolves the same as the original on Metaculus.

(https://www.metaculus.com/questions/question_embed/25755/?theme=dark)Resolution criteria

This question will resolve as Yes if prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign makes a definitive, public, official announcement to the effect that Joe Biden will not seek and will not accept the nomination of his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 cycle.

To qualify for a Yes resolution, the statement must be unambiguous and conclusive: it should leave no room for the possibility that Biden would accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle.

If such a definitive statement is not made prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, this question will resolve as No.

Fine print and additional background information can be found on Metaculus.

Once the original resolves, its resolution will be applied to this market automatically. Trustworthy-ish users are encouraged to resolve this market before then if the outcome is known and unambiguous. Feel free to ping @jskf to request early resolution or to report issues.

Once the original resolves, its resolution will be applied to this market automatically. Trustworthy-ish users are encouraged to resolve this market before then if the outcome is known and unambiguous. Feel free to ping @jskf to request early resolution or to report issues.

para_P.title: Is it possible for both of the following to take place: (a) Liz Cheney becomes the Republican candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election and (b) Joe Biden makes a public announcement before July 15, 2024, stating that he will not accept the Democratic nomination for President?
para_P.body:
(a) This inquiry will conclude as **Yes** if Liz Cheney is chosen by the Republican National Convention as the candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election. Any other candidates will result in a **No** resolution. This question is not limited to the candidates currently mentioned; additional options may be introduced later.

For this inquiry, it does not matter who is nominated by the Republicans on the day of the 2024 US election; it is determined solely by the selection made by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

(b) This inquiry will resolve as Yes if, before 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign issues a clear, public, official statement indicating that Joe Biden will not pursue and will not accept the nomination of his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle.

To qualify for a Yes outcome, the statement must be clear and definitive: it should eliminate any possibility that Biden would accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle.

If such a definitive statement is not made prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, this inquiry will resolve as No.

Additional details and background information can be found on Metaculus.

Once the original inquiry resolves, its resolution will automatically apply to this market. Users deemed trustworthy are encouraged to resolve this market early if the outcome is known and clear. Please feel free to ping @jskf to request early resolution or to report issues.

question.title: Will Switzerland qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Switzerland participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Switzerland does not qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will Switzerland not qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Switzerland does not participate in a Semi-final or is not officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Switzerland qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Is Switzerland going to make it to the Grand Final of Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be considered **Yes** if Switzerland competes in a Semi-final and is officially recognized by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having advanced to the Grand Final of Eurovision 2024. Conversely, if Switzerland fails to qualify, the outcome will be **No**.

question.title: Will Portugal qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Portugal participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Portugal does not qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will Portugal not qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Portugal does not participate in a Semi-final or is not officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Portugal qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Is Portugal going to make it to the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will conclude as **Yes** if Portugal takes part in a Semi-final and is officially recognized by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having advanced to the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. Conversely, if Portugal fails to qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

question.title: Will both Switzerland and Portugal qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if both Switzerland and Portugal participate in a Semi-final and are officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If either or both do not qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will either Switzerland or Portugal not qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if either Switzerland or Portugal does not participate in a Semi-final or is not officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If both qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Are Switzerland and Portugal set to make it to the Grand Final of Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will conclude as **Yes** if both Switzerland and Portugal take part in a Semi-final and are officially recognized by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having advanced to the Grand Final of Eurovision 2024. Should either or both fail to qualify, the outcome will be **No**.

question.title: Will Ted Cruz be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if Ted Cruz is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. All other candidates will resolve as **No**. This question is not restricted to the candidates currently below; other options may be added in the future.

For this question, it is not relevant who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

not_P.title: Will Ted Cruz not be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
not_P.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if Ted Cruz is not selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. If he is selected, it will resolve as **No**. This question is not restricted to the candidates currently below; other options may be added in the future.

For this question, it is not relevant who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

para_P.title: Is Ted Cruz going to be the Republican candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will be answered with **Yes** if Ted Cruz is chosen by the Republican National Convention as the candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election. Any other candidates will lead to a resolution of **No**. This question is not limited to the candidates currently listed; additional options may be introduced later.

For the purpose of this question, it does not matter who is nominated by the Republican Party on the day of the 2024 US election; the determination is solely based on who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

question.title: Will Trump's lead over Biden be greater than 2 and less than or equal to 3 on July 15, 2024, according to 538's national polling average?
question.body:
This question will resolve as Donald Trump's lead over Joe Biden in 538's [national polling average for the 2024 presidential election](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/2024/national/) as reported on the chart for the date of July 15, 2024, when accessed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024.

For the purposes of this question, a positive value means a Trump lead, while a negative value means Biden is leading. For example, as of July 5, 2024, the value reported for July 5 is Trump 2.4 points ahead of Biden, which would be a positive value of 2.4 for this purposes of this question.

not_P.title: Will Trump's lead over Biden be less than or equal to 2 or greater than 3 on July 15, 2024, according to 538's national polling average?
not_P.body:
This question will resolve as Donald Trump's lead over Joe Biden in 538's [national polling average for the 2024 presidential election](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/2024/national/) as reported on the chart for the date of July 15, 2024, when accessed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024.

For the purposes of this question, a positive value means a Trump lead, while a negative value means Biden is leading. For example, as of July 5, 2024, the value reported for July 5 is Trump 2.4 points ahead of Biden, which would be a positive value of 2.4 for this purposes of this question.

para_P.title: On July 15, 2024, will the margin by which Trump is ahead of Biden be more than 2 but not exceed 3 according to 538's national polling average?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will be determined by the extent of Donald Trump's advantage over Joe Biden in 538's [national polling average for the 2024 presidential election](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/2024/national/) as indicated on the chart for July 15, 2024, when reviewed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024.

In this context, a positive figure indicates a lead for Trump, whereas a negative figure signifies that Biden is in front. For instance, on July 5, 2024, the reported value shows Trump leading Biden by 2.4 points, which translates to a positive figure of 2.4 for the purpose of this inquiry.

question.title: Will Ted Cruz be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election AND will Trump's lead over Biden be greater than 2 and less than or equal to 3 on July 15, 2024, according to 538's national polling average?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if both of the following conditions are met: (1) Ted Cruz is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. This is determined solely by who is selected by the delegates of the Republican National Convention. (2) Donald Trump's lead over Joe Biden in 538's national polling average for the 2024 presidential election is greater than 2 and less than or equal to 3 on July 15, 2024, when accessed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024. A positive value indicates a Trump lead.

not_P.title: Will Ted Cruz not be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election OR will Trump's lead over Biden be less than or equal to 2 or greater than 3 on July 15, 2024, according to 538's national polling average?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if either of the following conditions is met: (1) Ted Cruz is not selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. This is determined solely by who is selected by the delegates of the Republican National Convention. (2) Donald Trump's lead over Joe Biden in 538's national polling average for the 2024 presidential election is less than or equal to 2 or greater than 3 on July 15, 2024, when accessed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024. A positive value indicates a Trump lead.

para_P.title: Is Ted Cruz going to be the Republican candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election, and will Trump's advantage over Biden be more than 2 but no greater than 3 on July 15, 2024, based on 538's national polling average?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered as **Yes** if both of the following criteria are satisfied: (1) Ted Cruz is chosen by the Republican National Convention as the candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election, as determined exclusively by the delegates' selection at the Republican National Convention. (2) Donald Trump's lead over Joe Biden in the 538 national polling average for the 2024 presidential election is more than 2 and at most 3 on July 15, 2024, as accessed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024. A positive value signifies a lead for Trump.

question.title: [Short Fuse] Will the proxy advisor Institutional Shareholder Services (ISS) advise Tesla shareholders to vote against Elon Musk's $57 billion package OR the re-election of Kimbal Musk?
question.body: The question will resolve **Yes** if Institutional Shareholder Services (ISS) releases a statement explicitly advising Tesla shareholders to vote *against* Elon Musk's pay package at the 2024 Tesla shareholder meeting OR the re-election of Kimbal Musk to the Tesla board of directors. Otherwise the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: [Short Fuse] Will the proxy advisor Institutional Shareholder Services (ISS) not advise Tesla shareholders to vote against Elon Musk's $57 billion package AND the re-election of Kimbal Musk?
not_P.body: The question will resolve **Yes** if Institutional Shareholder Services (ISS) does not release a statement explicitly advising Tesla shareholders to vote *against* Elon Musk's pay package at the 2024 Tesla shareholder meeting AND the re-election of Kimbal Musk to the Tesla board of directors. Otherwise the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: [Short Fuse] Will Institutional Shareholder Services (ISS) recommend that Tesla investors oppose Elon Musk's $57 billion compensation plan or the re-election of Kimbal Musk?
para_P.body: The question will resolve **Yes** if Institutional Shareholder Services (ISS) issues a statement clearly recommending Tesla investors to vote *against* Elon Musk's remuneration package at the 2024 Tesla shareholder meeting or the re-election of Kimbal Musk to the Tesla board. If not, the question will resolve as **No**.

question.title: Will Donald Trump Jr. be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if Donald Trump Jr. is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. All other candidates will resolve as **No**. This question is not restricted to the candidates currently mentioned; other options may be added in the future.

For this question, it is not relevant who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

not_P.title: Will Donald Trump Jr. not be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
not_P.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if Donald Trump Jr. is not selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. All other candidates will resolve as **No**. This question is not restricted to the candidates currently mentioned; other options may be added in the future.

For this question, it is not relevant who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

para_P.title: Is Donald Trump Jr. going to be the Republican candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will conclude as **Yes** if Donald Trump Jr. is chosen by the Republican National Convention as the candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election. Any other candidates will result in a **No**. This question is not limited to the candidates currently discussed; additional options may emerge later.

For the purpose of this question, it does not matter who obtains the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is exclusively determined by who is appointed by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

question.title: Will BOTH of the following occur: (1) the proxy advisor ISS advises Tesla shareholders to vote against Elon Musk's pay package OR the re-election of Kimbal Musk, AND (2) Donald Trump Jr. is the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body:
(1) The first condition will resolve **Yes** if Institutional Shareholder Services (ISS) releases a statement explicitly advising Tesla shareholders to vote *against* either Elon Musk's pay package at the 2024 Tesla shareholder meeting OR the re-election of Kimbal Musk to the Tesla board of directors. Otherwise, it resolves as **No**.

(2) The second condition will resolve as **Yes** if Donald Trump Jr. is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. It does not matter who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by the selection at the Republican National Convention.

not_P.title: Will EITHER of the following NOT occur: (1) the proxy advisor ISS advises Tesla shareholders to vote against Elon Musk's pay package AND the re-election of Kimbal Musk, OR (2) Donald Trump Jr. is not the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
not_P.body:
(1) The first condition will resolve **Yes** if Institutional Shareholder Services (ISS) does not release a statement explicitly advising Tesla shareholders to vote *against* both Elon Musk's pay package at the 2024 Tesla shareholder meeting AND the re-election of Kimbal Musk to the Tesla board of directors. Otherwise, it resolves as **No**.

(2) The second condition will resolve as **Yes** if Donald Trump Jr. is not selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. It does not matter who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by the selection at the Republican National Convention.

para_P.title: Is it true that BOTH of the following will happen: (1) ISS recommends that Tesla shareholders oppose Elon Musk's compensation package OR the re-election of Kimbal Musk, AND (2) Donald Trump Jr. becomes the Republican candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
para_P.body:
(1) The first condition will resolve as **Yes** if Institutional Shareholder Services (ISS) issues a statement clearly recommending Tesla shareholders to vote *against* either Elon Musk's compensation package at the 2024 Tesla shareholder meeting OR the re-election of Kimbal Musk to the Tesla board of directors. If not, it will resolve as **No**.

(2) The second condition will resolve as **Yes** if Donald Trump Jr. is chosen by the Republican National Convention as the candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election. The identity of the Republican nominee on the day of the 2024 US election is irrelevant; it is solely based on the choice made at the Republican National Convention.

question.title: Will Kalenjin athletes win both the men's and women's marathon races at the 2024 Paris Olympics?
question.body: This question resolves as **Yes** if both the winner of the men's and winner's marathon at the 2024 Summer Olympics in Paris have Kalenjin roots, according to [credible sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions).

not_P.title: Will Kalenjin athletes not win both the men's and women's marathon races at the 2024 Paris Olympics?
not_P.body: This question resolves as **Yes** if either the winner of the men's marathon or the winner of the women's marathon at the 2024 Summer Olympics in Paris do not have Kalenjin roots, according to [credible sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions).

para_P.title: Are Kalenjin runners set to triumph in both the men's and women's marathon events at the 2024 Paris Olympic Games?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be considered resolved as **Yes** if both the male and female marathon champions at the 2024 Summer Olympics in Paris originate from the Kalenjin community, based on [reliable sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions).

question.title: Will Sifan Hassan win a medal at the 2024 Paris Olympics?
question.body: Resolves YES if Sifan Hassan wins any medal at the 2024 Paris Olympics, NO otherwise

not_P.title: Will Sifan Hassan not win a medal at the 2024 Paris Olympics?
not_P.body: Resolves YES if Sifan Hassan does not win any medal at the 2024 Paris Olympics, YES otherwise.

para_P.title: Is it possible for Sifan Hassan to secure a medal at the 2024 Paris Olympics?
para_P.body: Determines YES if Sifan Hassan achieves any medal at the 2024 Paris Olympics, NO if she does not.

question.title: Will Kalenjin athletes win both the men's and women's marathon races and will Sifan Hassan win a medal at the 2024 Paris Olympics?
question.body: This question resolves as **Yes** if both of the following conditions are met: (1) Both the winner of the men's and women's marathon at the 2024 Summer Olympics in Paris have Kalenjin roots, according to [credible sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions). (2) Sifan Hassan wins any medal at the 2024 Paris Olympics. Resolves NO otherwise.

not_P.title: Will Kalenjin athletes not win both the men's and women's marathon races or will Sifan Hassan not win a medal at the 2024 Paris Olympics?
not_P.body: This question resolves as **Yes** if either of the following conditions is met: (1) At least one of the winners of the men's and women's marathon at the 2024 Summer Olympics in Paris does not have Kalenjin roots, according to [credible sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions). (2) Sifan Hassan does not win any medal at the 2024 Paris Olympics. Resolves YES otherwise.

para_P.title: Will athletes of Kalenjin descent claim victory in both the men's and women's marathon events, and will Sifan Hassan secure a medal at the 2024 Paris Games?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered as **Yes** if both of the subsequent criteria are satisfied: (1) The champions of the men's and women's marathon at the 2024 Summer Olympics in Paris are of Kalenjin heritage, as verified by [reliable sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions). (2) Sifan Hassan earns any medal during the 2024 Paris Olympics. It will be answered as NO in all other cases.

question.title: Will the Crimean Bridge be hit with an attack before July 1, 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if, after May 2, 2024, and before the listed date, [credible sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions) report that the Crimean Bridge has been struck with weapons fire, explosives, or projectiles that could pose a credible threat to the integrity of the bridge.

not_P.title: Will the Crimean Bridge not be hit with an attack before July 1, 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if, after May 2, 2024, and before the listed date, [credible sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions) report that the Crimean Bridge has not been struck with weapons fire, explosives, or projectiles that could pose a credible threat to the integrity of the bridge.

para_P.title: Is there a possibility that the Crimean Bridge will experience an attack prior to July 1, 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with **Yes** if, between May 2, 2024, and the specified date, [reliable sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions) indicate that the Crimean Bridge has been targeted by gunfire, explosives, or projectiles that could seriously compromise the structural integrity of the bridge.

question.title: Will Joe Biden still be president by the end of July?
question.body: This market will resolve yes if at 11:59 pm on July 31st 2024 if Joe Biden is still officially president of the United States.

not_P.title: Will Joe Biden no longer be president by the end of July?
not_P.body: This market will resolve yes if at 11:59 pm on July 31st 2024 if Joe Biden is no longer officially president of the United States.

para_P.title: Will Joe Biden remain in office as president until the conclusion of July?
para_P.body: This market will conclude with a yes if at 11:59 pm on July 31st, 2024, Joe Biden is still the officially recognized president of the United States.

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) the Crimean Bridge be hit with an attack before July 1, 2024, and (b) Joe Biden still be president by the end of July 2024?
question.body: (a) The Crimean Bridge is reported by credible sources to have been struck with weapons fire, explosives, or projectiles that could pose a credible threat to its integrity after May 2, 2024, and before July 1, 2024. (b) Joe Biden is officially the president of the United States at 11:59 pm on July 31st, 2024.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur: (a) the Crimean Bridge be hit with an attack before July 1, 2024, nor (b) Joe Biden still be president by the end of July 2024?
not_P.body: (a) The Crimean Bridge is not reported by credible sources to have been struck with weapons fire, explosives, or projectiles that could pose a credible threat to its integrity after May 2, 2024, or before July 1, 2024. (b) Joe Biden is not officially the president of the United States at 11:59 pm on July 31st, 2024.

para_P.title: Is it possible that both of these events will take place: (a) the Crimean Bridge experiences an attack prior to July 1, 2024, and (b) Joe Biden remains in office as president until the end of July 2024?
para_P.body: (a) Credible reports indicate that the Crimean Bridge may be targeted with gunfire, explosives, or missiles that could significantly threaten its structural integrity between May 2, 2024, and July 1, 2024. (b) Joe Biden holds the position of president of the United States at 11:59 pm on July 31, 2024.

question.title: Will Joe Biden announce that he is both dropping out and resigning from the presidency before the end of July?
question.body:
Resolves YES if Joe Biden announces both that he is no longer running for re-election and that he will be resigning and not completing his current term. These announcements before the end of July 2024 in Pacific Time, but he does not have to have formally resigned and be out of office before the end of July. An announcement of his intention to do so is sufficient to resolve this market.

Otherwise, this market resolves NO on August 1st.

not_P.title: Will Joe Biden not announce that he is either dropping out or resigning from the presidency before the end of July?
not_P.body:
Resolves YES if Joe Biden does not announce either that he is no longer running for re-election or that he will be resigning and not completing his current term. These announcements must not occur before the end of July 2024 in Pacific Time. An announcement of his intention to do so is not sufficient to resolve this market positively.

Otherwise, this market resolves NO on August 1st.

para_P.title: Will Joe Biden declare his intention to withdraw from the presidential race and step down from office prior to the conclusion of July?
para_P.body:
This resolves to YES if Joe Biden makes an announcement stating that he is no longer pursuing re-election and that he will be resigning, thereby not finishing his current term. Such announcements must occur before the end of July 2024 in Pacific Time; however, he is not required to have officially resigned and vacated his position by that time. An announcement of his plan to resign will suffice for this market to resolve positively.

If no such announcement is made, this market will resolve to NO on August 1st.

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) Joe Biden announces he is dropping out and resigning before the end of July 2024, and (b) USD is worth >= 145 JPY at close on August 9th, 2024?
question.body:
(a) Resolves YES if Joe Biden announces both that he is no longer running for re-election and that he will be resigning and not completing his current term. These announcements must be made before the end of July 2024 in Pacific Time, but he does not have to have formally resigned and be out of office before the end of July. An announcement of his intention to do so is sufficient to resolve this part.

Otherwise, this part resolves NO on August 1st.

(b) Resolves YES if the USD/JPY close listed for August 9th, 2024 on Yahoo! Finance is greater than or equal to 145 JPY. Otherwise, resolves NO.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur: (a) Joe Biden announces he is dropping out and resigning before the end of July 2024, nor (b) USD is worth >= 145 JPY at close on August 9th, 2024?
not_P.body:
(a) Resolves YES if Joe Biden does not announce both that he is no longer running for re-election and that he will be resigning and not completing his current term. These announcements must not be made before the end of July 2024 in Pacific Time. An announcement of his intention to do so is not sufficient to resolve this part.

Otherwise, this part resolves NO on August 1st.

(b) Resolves YES if the USD/JPY close listed for August 9th, 2024 on Yahoo! Finance is less than 145 JPY. Otherwise, resolves NO.

para_P.title: Is it possible that both of the following happen: (a) Joe Biden declares his intention to withdraw and resign prior to the end of July 2024, and (b) the USD reaches a value of at least 145 JPY at the close on August 9th, 2024?
para_P.body:
(a) This will be marked as YES if Joe Biden states that he is no longer pursuing re-election and that he will resign from his current term. These declarations must occur before the end of July 2024 in Pacific Time, though he does not need to have officially stepped down by then. A statement of his intention to resign is adequate for this part to resolve positively.

If this does not happen, this part will be marked as NO on August 1st.

(b) This will be marked as YES if the USD/JPY closing rate listed for August 9th, 2024 on Yahoo! Finance is at least 145 JPY. If not, it will be marked as NO.

question.title: Kamala president by Friday?
question.body:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Vice President Kamala Harris is formally designated as President or Acting President of the United States at any point before July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the US government, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

Resolver

not_P.title: Kamala not president by Friday?
not_P.body:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Vice President Kamala Harris is not formally designated as President or Acting President of the United States at any point before July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the US government, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

Resolver

para_P.title: Will Kamala Harris assume the presidency by Friday?
para_P.body:
This market will conclude with a "Yes" if Vice President Kamala Harris is officially named as President or Acting President of the United States at any time prior to July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. If this does not occur, the market will conclude with a "No".

The main source for resolution will be official announcements from the US government, but a consensus of reliable news reports will also be taken into account.

Resolver

question.title: Will Donald Trump be charged with witness tampering in Georgia before June 1, 2024?
question.body: The question resolves **Yes** if Donald Trump is charged or indicted for any statements related to potential witnesses in *[The State of Georgia v. Donald J. Trump, et al](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prosecution_of_Donald_Trump_in_Georgia)*. The indictments must occur before June 1, 2024.

not_P.title: Will Donald Trump not be charged with witness tampering in Georgia before June 1, 2024?
not_P.body: The question resolves **Yes** if Donald Trump is not charged or indicted for any statements related to potential witnesses in *[The State of Georgia v. Donald J. Trump, et al](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prosecution_of_Donald_Trump_in_Georgia)*. The indictments must occur before June 1, 2024.

para_P.title: Is there a possibility that Donald Trump will face charges for witness tampering in Georgia prior to June 1, 2024?
para_P.body: This question will be answered with **Yes** if Donald Trump is charged or indicted concerning any remarks made about potential witnesses in *[The State of Georgia v. Donald J. Trump, et al](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prosecution_of_Donald_Trump_in_Georgia)*. The charges must be filed before June 1, 2024.

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) Kamala Harris becomes President or Acting President of the United States before July 26, 2024, and (b) Donald Trump is charged with witness tampering in Georgia before June 1, 2024?
question.body:
(a) Kamala Harris will be formally designated as President or Acting President of the United States at any point before July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. The primary resolution source for this will be official information from the US government, but a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.
(b) Donald Trump will be charged or indicted for any statements related to potential witnesses in *The State of Georgia v. Donald J. Trump, et al*. The indictments must occur before June 1, 2024.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur: (a) Kamala Harris becomes President or Acting President of the United States before July 26, 2024, nor (b) Donald Trump is charged with witness tampering in Georgia before June 1, 2024?
not_P.body:
(a) Kamala Harris will not be formally designated as President or Acting President of the United States at any point before July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. The primary resolution source for this will be official information from the US government, but a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.
(b) Donald Trump will not be charged or indicted for any statements related to potential witnesses in *The State of Georgia v. Donald J. Trump, et al*. The indictments must not occur before June 1, 2024.

para_P.title: Is it possible that both of the following take place: (a) Kamala Harris is appointed as President or Acting President of the United States prior to July 26, 2024, and (b) Donald Trump faces charges for witness tampering in Georgia before June 1, 2024?
para_P.body:
(a) At any time before July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, Kamala Harris will be officially recognized as President or Acting President of the United States. The main source for this determination will be official announcements from the US government, supplemented by a consensus of reliable news reporting.
(b) Donald Trump will be indicted or charged regarding any comments pertaining to potential witnesses in *The State of Georgia v. Donald J. Trump, et al*. These charges must be filed before June 1, 2024.

question.title: Will Biden be declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4 before August?
question.body:
Resolves YES if the Vice President and a majority of the Cabinet (or other relevant body) invokes Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to formally declare that "the President is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office" and cause the Vice President to serve as Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time).

The duration of the incapacity does not matter for this question.

Biden exiting the office of the Presidency by death, resignation, etc does not count. Biden invoking section 3 of the 25th amendment does not count.

Context: GOP lawmaker asks Merrick Garland to invoke 25th Amendment to remove Biden from office

not_P.title: Will Biden not be declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4 before August?
not_P.body:
Resolves YES if the Vice President and a majority of the Cabinet (or other relevant body) do not invoke Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to formally declare that "the President is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office" and cause the Vice President to serve as Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time).

The duration of the incapacity does not matter for this question.

Biden exiting the office of the Presidency by death, resignation, etc does not count. Biden invoking section 3 of the 25th amendment does not count.

Context: GOP lawmaker asks Merrick Garland to not invoke 25th Amendment to remove Biden from office.

para_P.title: Will the 25th Amendment Section 4 be invoked to declare Biden incapacitated prior to August?
para_P.body:
This will be marked as YES if the Vice President along with a majority of the Cabinet (or another appropriate body) activates Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to officially state that "the President is unable to fulfill the powers and responsibilities of his office" and allows the Vice President to take on the role of Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time).

The length of the incapacity is irrelevant to this inquiry.

Biden leaving the Presidency due to death, resignation, etc., is not included. Biden's invocation of section 3 of the 25th amendment is not counted.

Context: A GOP lawmaker requests Merrick Garland to utilize the 25th Amendment to remove Biden from his position.

question.title: Before July 1, 2024, will the International Criminal Court issue arrest warrants for any of the listed Israeli leaders?
question.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if before July 1, 2024, the International Criminal Court (ICC) issues a [warrant of arrest](https://www.icc-cpi.int/about/how-the-court-works) for any of the below listed Israeli cabinet members. It will resolve as **No** otherwise.

* Benjamin Netanyahu (Prime Minister)
* Yoav Gallant (Defense Minister)
* Herzi Halevi (IDF Chief of Staff)

not_P.title: Before July 1, 2024, will the International Criminal Court not issue arrest warrants for any of the listed Israeli leaders?
not_P.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if before July 1, 2024, the International Criminal Court (ICC) does not issue a [warrant of arrest](https://www.icc-cpi.int/about/how-the-court-works) for any of the below listed Israeli cabinet members. It will resolve as **No** otherwise.

* Benjamin Netanyahu (Prime Minister)
* Yoav Gallant (Defense Minister)
* Herzi Halevi (IDF Chief of Staff)

para_P.title: Will any of the specified Israeli leaders face arrest warrants from the International Criminal Court before July 1, 2024?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will be answered with **Yes** if the International Criminal Court (ICC) issues a [warrant of arrest](https://www.icc-cpi.int/about/how-the-court-works) for any of the Israeli cabinet members listed below prior to July 1, 2024. It will be answered with **No** in all other cases.

* Benjamin Netanyahu (Prime Minister)
* Yoav Gallant (Defense Minister)
* Herzi Halevi (IDF Chief of Staff)

question.title: Will Biden be declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4 before August 2024, and will the ICC issue arrest warrants for any listed Israeli leaders before July 1, 2024?
question.body:
This question resolves as YES if both of the following occur:

(a) Before August 2024 (Eastern time), the Vice President and a majority of the Cabinet (or other relevant body) invoke Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to formally declare that "the President is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office" and cause the Vice President to serve as Acting President. The duration of the incapacity does not matter for this question. Note that Biden exiting the office of the Presidency by death, resignation, etc does not count, nor does Biden invoking section 3 of the 25th amendment. Context: GOP lawmaker asks Merrick Garland to invoke 25th Amendment to remove Biden from office.

(b) Before July 1, 2024, the International Criminal Court (ICC) issues a warrant of arrest for any of the below listed Israeli cabinet members. It will resolve as NO otherwise.
   - Benjamin Netanyahu (Prime Minister)
   - Yoav Gallant (Defense Minister)
   - Herzi Halevi (IDF Chief of Staff)

not_P.title: Will Biden not be declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4 before August 2024, or will the ICC not issue arrest warrants for any listed Israeli leaders before July 1, 2024?
not_P.body:
This question resolves as YES if either of the following does not occur:

(a) Before August 2024 (Eastern time), the Vice President and a majority of the Cabinet (or other relevant body) do not invoke Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to formally declare that "the President is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office" and do not cause the Vice President to serve as Acting President. The duration of the incapacity does not matter for this question. Note that Biden exiting the office of the Presidency by death, resignation, etc does not count, nor does Biden invoking section 3 of the 25th amendment. Context: GOP lawmaker asks Merrick Garland to invoke 25th Amendment to remove Biden from office.

(b) Before July 1, 2024, the International Criminal Court (ICC) does not issue a warrant of arrest for any of the below listed Israeli cabinet members. It will resolve as YES otherwise.
   - Benjamin Netanyahu (Prime Minister)
   - Yoav Gallant (Defense Minister)
   - Herzi Halevi (IDF Chief of Staff)

para_P.title: Is it possible that Biden will be officially recognized as unable to fulfill his presidential duties under Section 4 of the 25th Amendment prior to August 2024, and will the ICC release arrest warrants for any specified Israeli officials before July 1, 2024?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will be considered TRUE if both of the subsequent conditions are met:

(a) Prior to August 2024 (Eastern time), the Vice President along with a majority of the Cabinet (or another relevant authority) invoke Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to officially declare that "the President is incapable of performing the powers and responsibilities of his office" and enable the Vice President to assume the role of Acting President. The length of the incapacity is irrelevant for this inquiry. It is important to note that Biden leaving the presidency due to death, resignation, etc., does not qualify, nor does Biden activating Section 3 of the 25th Amendment. Context: A GOP legislator requests Merrick Garland to apply the 25th Amendment to remove Biden from office.

(b) Before July 1, 2024, the International Criminal Court (ICC) must issue an arrest warrant for any of the Israeli cabinet members listed below. It will be deemed FALSE otherwise.
   - Benjamin Netanyahu (Prime Minister)
   - Yoav Gallant (Defense Minister)
   - Herzi Halevi (IDF Chief of Staff)

question.title: [Metaculus] Will Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024 that he will not accept the Democra...nomination for President?
question.body:
Will Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024 that he will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President?

Resolves the same as the original on Metaculus.

(https://www.metaculus.com/questions/question_embed/25755/?theme=dark)Resolution criteria

This question will resolve as Yes if prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign makes a definitive, public, official announcement to the effect that Joe Biden will not seek and will not accept the nomination of his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 cycle.

To qualify for a Yes resolution, the statement must be unambiguous and conclusive: it should leave no room for the possibility that Biden would accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle.

If such a definitive statement is not made prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, this question will resolve as No.

Fine print and additional background information can be found on Metaculus.

Once the original resolves, its resolution will be applied to this market automatically. Trustworthy-ish users are encouraged to resolve this market before then if the outcome is known and unambiguous. Feel free to ping @jskf to request early resolution or to report issues.

question.title: Will Chris Christie be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if Chris Christie is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. All other candidates will resolve as **No**. This question is not restricted to the candidates currently mentioned; other options may be added in the future.

For this question, it is not relevant who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the Republican National Convention.

not_P.title: Will Chris Christie not be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
not_P.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if Chris Christie is not selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. All other candidates will resolve as **No**. This question is not restricted to the candidates currently mentioned; other options may be added in the future.

For this question, it is not relevant who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the Republican National Convention.

para_P.title: Will Chris Christie be the Republican candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will be answered with **Yes** if Chris Christie is chosen by the Republican National Convention as the candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election. Any other contenders will be answered with **No**. This question is not limited to the candidates currently discussed; additional options may be introduced later.

For this question, it does not matter who is nominated by the Republican Party on the day of the 2024 US election; the determination is solely based on who is selected by the delegates of the Republican National Convention.

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) Joe Biden announces before July 15, 2024, that he will not accept the Democratic nomination for President, and (b) Chris Christie is the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body:
(a) Will Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024, that he will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President?

This resolves as Yes if prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign makes a definitive, public, official announcement that he will not seek and will not accept the nomination of his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 cycle. The statement must be unambiguous and conclusive, leaving no room for the possibility that Biden would accept the Democratic Party's nomination.

(b) Will Chris Christie be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?

This resolves as Yes if Chris Christie is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. It is determined by who is selected by the delegates of the Republican National Convention, not who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the election.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur: (a) Joe Biden announces before July 15, 2024, that he will not accept the Democratic nomination for President, nor (b) Chris Christie is the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
not_P.body:
(a) Will Joe Biden not announce before July 15, 2024, that he will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President?

This resolves as Yes if prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign does not make a definitive, public, official announcement that he will not seek and will not accept the nomination of his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 cycle. The statement must be unambiguous and conclusive, leaving room for the possibility that Biden would accept the Democratic Party's nomination.

(b) Will Chris Christie not be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?

This resolves as Yes if Chris Christie is not selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. It is determined by who is not selected by the delegates of the Republican National Convention, not who does not receive the Republican nomination on the day of the election.

para_P.title: Is it true that both of the following will take place: (a) Joe Biden makes an announcement before July 15, 2024, indicating he will not seek the Democratic nomination for President, and (b) Chris Christie is chosen as the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
para_P.body:
(a) Will Joe Biden declare prior to July 15, 2024, that he will not pursue the Democratic Party's nomination for President?

This is considered a Yes if, before 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign provides a clear, public, official statement that he will not run and will not accept the nomination of his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle. The announcement must be clear and definitive, leaving no possibility that Biden would accept the Democratic Party's nomination.

(b) Will Chris Christie be the chosen nominee for the Republican Party in the 2024 US Presidential Election?

This is considered a Yes if Chris Christie is nominated by the Republican National Convention for the 2024 US Presidential Election. The determination is made based on who is selected by the delegates of the Republican National Convention, rather than who is announced as the Republican nominee on election day.

question.title: Will the domestic box office opening of "Deadpool & Wolverine" be higher than that of "Deadpool" and "The Wolverine" combined?
question.body: This question resolves as **Yes** if the domestic box office opening for the **Deadpool & Wolverine** reported by Boxofficemojo on the [movie's page](https://www.boxofficemojo.com/title/tt6263850/?ref_=bo_se_r_1) is higher than $185,548,391 which is the sum of the box openings for **Deadpool** (2016) and **The Wolverine** (2013): $132,434,639 + $53,113,752.

not_P.title: Will the domestic box office opening of "Deadpool & Wolverine" not be higher than that of "Deadpool" and "The Wolverine" combined?
not_P.body: This question resolves as **Yes** if the domestic box office opening for the **Deadpool & Wolverine** reported by Boxofficemojo on the [movie's page](https://www.boxofficemojo.com/title/tt6263850/?ref_=bo_se_r_1) is not higher than $185,548,391 which is the sum of the box openings for **Deadpool** (2016) and **The Wolverine** (2013): $132,434,639 + $53,113,752.

para_P.title: Will the opening weekend earnings of "Deadpool & Wolverine" surpass those of "Deadpool" and "The Wolverine" combined?
para_P.body: This question will be answered with **Yes** if the opening weekend earnings for **Deadpool & Wolverine** as reported by Boxofficemojo on the [movie's page](https://www.boxofficemojo.com/title/tt6263850/?ref_=bo_se_r_1) exceed $185,548,391, which is the total of the box office earnings for **Deadpool** (2016) and **The Wolverine** (2013): $132,434,639 + $53,113,752.

para_P.title: Is there a possibility that Biden will be recognized as incapacitated under Section 4 of the 25th Amendment prior to August?
para_P.body:
This question is answered with a YES if the Vice President along with a majority of the Cabinet (or another applicable body) activates Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to officially state that "the President is unable to fulfill the powers and responsibilities of his office" and allows the Vice President to assume the role of Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time).

The length of the incapacity is not relevant to this inquiry.

Biden leaving the Presidential office due to death, resignation, etc., is not applicable. Biden's own invocation of Section 3 of the 25th Amendment is not considered here.

Context: A GOP lawmaker has urged Merrick Garland to apply the 25th Amendment for Biden's removal from office.

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) Nikki Haley be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election and (b) Biden be declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4 before August 2024?
question.body:
(a) Nikki Haley will be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election if she is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee. This is determined solely by who is selected by the delegates of the Republican National Convention.

(b) Biden will be declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4 if the Vice President and a majority of the Cabinet (or other relevant body) invokes Section 4 to formally declare that "the President is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office" and cause the Vice President to serve as Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time). The duration of the incapacity does not matter, and Biden exiting the office of the Presidency by death, resignation, etc does not count. Biden invoking section 3 of the 25th amendment does not count.

not_P.title: Will at least one of the following not occur: (a) Nikki Haley be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election or (b) Biden be declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4 before August 2024?
not_P.body:
(a) Nikki Haley will not be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election if she is not selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee. This is determined solely by who is not selected by the delegates of the Republican National Convention.

(b) Biden will not be declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4 if the Vice President and a majority of the Cabinet (or other relevant body) do not invoke Section 4 to formally declare that "the President is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office" and cause the Vice President to serve as Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time). The duration of the incapacity does not matter, and Biden exiting the office of the Presidency by death, resignation, etc does not count. Biden invoking section 3 of the 25th amendment does not count.

para_P.title: Is it possible for both of the following to take place: (a) Nikki Haley becoming the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election and (b) Biden being declared unfit under Section 4 of the 25th Amendment prior to August 2024?
para_P.body:
(a) Nikki Haley will be named the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election if she is chosen by the Republican National Convention as their nominee. This decision is made exclusively by the delegates of the Republican National Convention.

(b) Biden will be recognized as incapacitated under Section 4 of the 25th Amendment if the Vice President along with a majority of the Cabinet (or another relevant authority) invokes Section 4 to officially declare that "the President is unable to perform the powers and responsibilities of his office" and allow the Vice President to act as President, before August 2024 (Eastern time). The length of the incapacity is irrelevant, and Biden leaving the Presidency due to death, resignation, etc., does not apply. Biden's invocation of Section 3 of the 25th Amendment is also not applicable.

question.title: Will Joe Biden announce that he is both dropping out and resigning from the presidency before the end of July?
question.body:
Resolves YES if Joe Biden announces both that he is no longer running for re-election and that he will be resigning and not completing his current term. These announcements before the end of July 2024 in Pacific Time, but he does not have to have formally resigned and be out of office before the end of July. An announcement of his intention to do so is sufficient to resolve this market.

Otherwise, this market resolves NO on August 1st.

not_P.title: Will Joe Biden not announce that he is either dropping out or resigning from the presidency before the end of July?
not_P.body:
Resolves YES if Joe Biden does not announce either that he is no longer running for re-election or that he will be resigning and not completing his current term. These announcements before the end of July 2024 in Pacific Time, but he does not have to have formally resigned and be out of office before the end of July. An announcement of his intention to do so is sufficient to resolve this market.

Otherwise, this market resolves NO on August 1st.

para_P.title: Is it possible that Joe Biden will declare his intention to both withdraw from the race and step down from the presidency prior to July's conclusion?
para_P.body:
This will resolve to YES if Joe Biden makes an announcement stating that he is ceasing his campaign for re-election and that he will be resigning from his current presidential term. Such declarations must occur before the end of July 2024 in Pacific Time, although he is not required to have officially resigned and vacated his position by that time. An announcement expressing his plan to do so will suffice to settle this market.

If no such announcement is made, this market will resolve to NO on August 1st.

question.title: Will Donald Trump be charged with witness tampering in Georgia before June 1, 2024?
question.body: The question resolves **Yes** if Donald Trump is charged or indicted for any statements related to potential witnesses in *[The State of Georgia v. Donald J. Trump, et al](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prosecution_of_Donald_Trump_in_Georgia)*. The indictments must occur before June 1, 2024.

Trump, et al](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prosecution_of_Donald_Trump_in_Georgia)*. The indictments must occur before June 1, 2024.

para_P.title: Is there a possibility that Donald Trump will face charges for witness tampering in Georgia prior to June 1, 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be resolved as **Yes** if Donald Trump is formally charged or indicted concerning any remarks about possible witnesses in *[The State of Georgia v. Donald J. Trump, et al](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prosecution_of_Donald_Trump_in_Georgia)*. The charges must be filed before June 1, 2024.

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) Joe Biden announces he is dropping out and resigning from the presidency before the end of July 2024, and (b) Donald Trump is charged with witness tampering in Georgia before June 1, 2024?
question.body:
(a) Resolves YES if Joe Biden announces both that he is no longer running for re-election and that he will be resigning and not completing his current term. These announcements must occur before the end of July 2024 in Pacific Time, but he does not have to have formally resigned and be out of office before the end of July. An announcement of his intention to do so is sufficient to resolve this part of the question.

Otherwise, this part resolves NO on August 1st.

(b) Resolves YES if Donald Trump is charged or indicted for any statements related to potential witnesses in *[The State of Georgia v. Donald J. Trump, et al](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prosecution_of_Donald_Trump_in_Georgia)*. The indictments must occur before June 1, 2024.

not_P.title: Will at least one of the following not occur: (a) Joe Biden announces he is dropping out and resigning from the presidency before the end of July 2024, or (b) Donald Trump is charged with witness tampering in Georgia before June 1, 2024?
not_P.body:
(a) Resolves YES if Joe Biden does not announce both that he is no longer running for re-election and that he will be resigning and not completing his current term. These announcements must not occur before the end of July 2024 in Pacific Time. An announcement of his intention to do so is not sufficient to resolve this part of the question.

Otherwise, this part resolves YES on August 1st.

(b) Resolves YES if Donald Trump is not charged or indicted for any statements related to potential witnesses in *[The State of Georgia v. Donald J. Trump, et al](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prosecution_of_Donald_Trump_in_Georgia)*. The indictments must not occur before June 1, 2024.

para_P.title: Is it true that both of the following events will take place: (a) Joe Biden declares he is withdrawing and resigning from the presidency prior to the end of July 2024, and (b) Donald Trump faces charges for witness tampering in Georgia before June 1, 2024?
para_P.body:
(a) This part will be marked YES if Joe Biden makes an announcement stating that he is no longer pursuing re-election and that he will be resigning from his current position, with both statements made before the conclusion of July 2024 in Pacific Time. It is not necessary for him to have officially resigned and vacated his position by the end of July; merely announcing his intention to do so is adequate for this part to be resolved positively.

If this does not happen, it will be marked NO on August 1st.

(b) This part will be marked YES if Donald Trump is charged or indicted regarding any remarks concerning possible witnesses in *[The State of Georgia v. Donald J. Trump, et al](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prosecution_of_Donald_Trump_in_Georgia)*. These charges must be filed before June 1, 2024.

question.title: Will Iceland qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Iceland participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If not, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will Iceland not qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Iceland does not participate in a Semi-final or is not officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If so, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Is Iceland going to make it to the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will conclude with a **Yes** if Iceland competes in a Semi-final and is formally recognized by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having advanced to the Grand Final of Eurovision 2024. Otherwise, the outcome will be **No**.

question.title: Will Ireland qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Ireland participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Ireland does not qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will Ireland not qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Ireland does not participate in a Semi-final or is not officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Ireland qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Is Ireland set to make it to the Grand Final at Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be deemed **Yes** if Ireland takes part in a Semi-final and the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) officially confirms its qualification for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. Conversely, if Ireland fails to qualify, the outcome will be **No**.

question.title: Will both Iceland and Ireland qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if both Iceland and Ireland participate in their respective Semi-finals and are officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If either or both do not qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will neither Iceland nor Ireland qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if neither Iceland nor Ireland participate in their respective Semi-finals or are officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If either or both qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Are both Iceland and Ireland set to make it to the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be considered **Yes** if both Iceland and Ireland compete in their individual Semi-finals and the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) officially declares them as qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If either or both fail to qualify, the outcome will be **No**.
